title: Custom Dark Mode and other features coming to Safari, WebKit code reveals
content:
iOS 15.4 has already given us a glimpse of new features to expect with the upcoming Safari update, which introduces push notifications for web apps and support for AR/VR headsets. However, WebKit code has now revealed that there’s more to come, including new settings for Dark Mode and pop-ups.

more…

The post Custom Dark Mode and other features coming to Safari, WebKit code reveals appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WebKit code has now revealed new features coming to Safari, including new settings for Dark Mode and pop-ups.
